short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download Single Google Sheet to xlsx

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple extension used to export a single Google Sheets tab (sheet) out to a .xlsx file. 

Sometimes when working on multiple tabs in one spreadsheet, you need to send just one sheet to a vendor in .xlsx format. This allows you to do that easily without hand modification of the URL.
